title: How to Make Flax Seed Muffins

steps.headline: Pre-Heat your conventional oven to 350 degrees.
steps.description: Also, pull out all your ingredients and muffin tin.

steps.headline: Take a large plastic mixing bowl.
steps.description: This will be used for your dry ingredients.

steps.headline: Begin with putting in the flour into the large mixing bowl.
Next put the flax seed into the large mixing bowl.
Put the oat bran into the large mixing bowl.
After, put the baking powder, baking soda, and salt into the large mixing bowl.
Put your cinnamon into the large mixing bowl.
Put that mixing bowl to the side and grab a medium size plastic mixing bowl.
steps.description: This will be used for your liquid ingredients.

steps.headline: In a separate medium size mixing bowl crack your one egg into the medium bowl
Now with that egg in the medium bowl whisk the egg until it is beaten completely
Put in the vanilla extract, into the medium bowl that has the beaten egg in it
Put the milk into the medium bowl that has the beaten egg in it.
Mix the vanilla extract, milk and egg together in the medium size bowl
With that same large bowl with the liquid ingredients (milk, egg, vanilla extract) put the raisins into the same bowl
Take a blender or small chopper and put the walnuts into the blender
Turn the blender on and make sure to let it run till the walnuts are finely chopped into pieces
With the medium bowl with milk, vanillas extract, and egg measure put this to the side
Put the finely chopped walnuts into the large bowl with the dry ingredients (flour, flax seed, oat brand, baking soda, baking power, salt, and cinnamon)
Take your apple and peal off all the skin and cut into apple slices
Take the apples and put them into a small chopper or blender(which ever you have works) and wait till they are finely chopped like the walnuts
Chopped up apple put it into that same large bowl with the liquid ingredients (milk, egg, vanilla extract)
Take the carrots and put them into a small chopper or blender and wait till they are finely chopped as well
Measure and put the finely chopped carrots into the medium size bowl that has the milk, egg, vanilla extract, apple, and raisins

When all the ingredients are into the medium size bowl with the wet ingredients (vanilla extract, milk, egg, raisins) put them into the large size bowl with eh dry ingredients (flour, flax seed, oat brand, baking soda, baking power, salt, and cinnamon)
Mix all the ingredients thoroughly in the large mixing bowl
Grab your muffin tin
Line each muffin cup with paper baking cups
Spoon each paper muffin cup 3/4 full
Put the muffin pans into the 350 degrees preheated oven
Set your timer for about 20 minutes to check the muffins
Take a toothpick and put into the center of the muffin, if the toothpick comes out clean then the muffins are done
Let the muffins cool in the pan and paper
Enjoy!

text: Pre-Heat your conventional oven to 350 degrees. Also, pull out all your ingredients and muffin tin. Take a large plastic mixing bowl. This will be used for your dry ingredients. Begin with putting in the flour into the large mixing bowl.  Next put the flax seed into the large mixing bowl.  Put the oat bran into the large mixing bowl.  After, put the baking powder, baking soda, and salt into the large mixing bowl.  Put your cinnamon into the large mixing bowl.  Put that mixing bowl to the side and grab a medium size plastic mixing bowl. This will be used for your liquid ingredients. In a separate medium size mixing bowl crack your one egg into the medium bowl  Now with that egg in the medium bowl whisk the egg until it is beaten completely  Put in the vanilla extract, into the medium bowl that has the beaten egg in it  Put the milk into the medium bowl that has the beaten egg in it.  Mix the vanilla extract, milk and egg together in the medium size bowl  With that same large bowl with the liquid ingredients (milk, egg, vanilla extract) put the raisins into the same bowl  Take a blender or small chopper and put the walnuts into the blender  Turn the blender on and make sure to let it run till the walnuts are finely chopped into pieces  With the medium bowl with milk, vanillas extract, and egg measure put this to the side  Put the finely chopped walnuts into the large bowl with the dry ingredients (flour, flax seed, oat brand, baking soda, baking power, salt, and cinnamon)  Take your apple and peal off all the skin and cut into apple slices  Take the apples and put them into a small chopper or blender(which ever you have works) and wait till they are finely chopped like the walnuts  Chopped up apple put it into that same large bowl with the liquid ingredients (milk, egg, vanilla extract)  Take the carrots and put them into a small chopper or blender and wait till they are finely chopped as well  Measure and put the finely chopped carrots into the medium size bowl that has the milk, egg, vanilla extract, apple, and raisins  When all the ingredients are into the medium size bowl with the wet ingredients (vanilla extract, milk, egg, raisins) put them into the large size bowl with eh dry ingredients (flour, flax seed, oat brand, baking soda, baking power, salt, and cinnamon)  Mix all the ingredients thoroughly in the large mixing bowl  Grab your muffin tin  Line each muffin cup with paper baking cups  Spoon each paper muffin cup 3/4 full  Put the muffin pans into the 350 degrees preheated oven  Set your timer for about 20 minutes to check the muffins  Take a toothpick and put into the center of the muffin, if the toothpick comes out clean then the muffins are done  Let the muffins cool in the pan and paper  Enjoy!
